title: wine_Sebastiani_2010_Cherryblock_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Sonoma_Valley)

Unnamed: 0: 30915.
country: US.
description: Visitors to Sonoma Valley are familiar with the beautiful Cherryblock Vineyard, which has been Sebastiani's flagship Cabernet source for decades. The 2010 vintage was kind to it, producing fruit that's not only exceptionally ripe, but well structured. Balanced acidity and soft, intricate tannins house luscious black cherry, currant, anise and new oak flavors. The wine should age in the bottle for at least eight years..
designation: Cherryblock.
points: 91.
